name: ObloLiving
0:
”Alexa, ask OBLO to set all lights in ground floor to 50”
”Alexa, ask OBLO to run Morning scene”
”Alexa, ask OBLO to check temperature in the basement kitchen”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oblo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Amazon Alexa and OBLO Living work together to make your everyday life easier by keeping you and your home safe, more efficient and more comfortable.
OBLO Living voice control by Alexa will help you to activate a scene, control lights, dimmers, shutters, sensors and even more. 

To control the OBLO Living smart home system with Alexa you need:
•  OBLO Living Home Automation Gateway
•  OBLO Living account 
•  Amazon Alexa device
The user manual can be found at https://cloud.oblo.rs/alexamanual.pdf
Here are some of the voice commands OBLO Living has:
• Alexa, ask OBLO to set all lights in ground floor to 50
• Alexa, ask OBLO to run Movie scene
• Alexa, ask OBLO to check temperature in the basement kitchen
